name: SilvioMan - The hero of the cock
name_original: SilvioMan - The hero of the cock
description:
Does our hero manage to defend the "bel paese" from the looming threats?

How play: The game supports touch, pressing on the black arrows to move and fire button to shoot. In place of touch, you can use the up and down arrow keys to move and the Z button to shoot

For comments, reports of bugs or informations: scardygames@yahoo.it
